Many cultural and literary events like Fashion Designing, Voice of VVCE, Computer gaming, Face painting, Dumb Charads, Tshirt Painting, Stunt show and many are conducted as a part of Annual Fest- The VIDYUTH
Many clubs have been initiated for promoting Entrepreneurship skills, Project development skills and all-round development of the students
• To provide the best teaching - learning environment through competent staff and excellent infrastructure
• To inculcate professional ethics, leadership qualities, communication and entrepreneurial skills to meet the societal needs
• To promote innovation through research and development
• To strengthen industry-institute interaction for knowledge sharing
VVCE shall be a leading Institution in engineering and management education enabling individuals for significant contribution to the society

VVCE – A Centre of Excellence in Technical & Management Education Vidyavardhaka Sangha (VVS) stands as a synonym for quality education in the heritage city of Mysuru. VVS was established in 1949 by great visionaries namely Late Sahukar Channaiah and Late. K. Puttaswamy (Former Minister of Karnataka) to impart quality education to all sections of the society. There are ten educational institutions starting from nursery to engineering college under the aegis of VVS. At present, Sangha is under the able guidance and leadership of Sri Gundappa Gowda, President and Sri P. Vishwanath, Secretary.

Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering, popularly referred as VVCE, is one of the most prestigious engineering colleges in Karnataka. Established in 1997, VVCE has grown in leaps and bounds. VVCE is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum, approved by AICTE, New Delhi and recognized by Govt. of Karnataka. VVCE functions through its Board of Governors constituted as per AICTE guidelines.

The college is under the able leadership of Dr. B. Sadashive Gowda as Principal, who has rich experience in industry and education field both in India and abroad. VVCE has a vision to become a centre of excellence in Academics and management education. The campus is equipped with six research centers providing opportunity to work in frontier areas of technology. Faculty members are well qualified, experienced and have great passion for teaching & learning. The faculties provide conducive learning environment empowering students with cutting edge knowledge. The learning environment includes technical seminars, projects, industry visits, entrepreneurial trainings, group discussions besides conventional teaching.

The college has taken stringent measures as per AICTE norms to prevent any incidents of ragging. VVCE has proved itself as one of the best colleges for technical and management education in Karnataka.

The college has an annual intake of 540 students for Under Graduate courses and 174 students for Post Graduate courses. The college now offers under graduate courses in six disciplines and PG courses in 2 disiplines. The following are the courses offered by the college at present
Separate hostel facilities are available for both boys and girl students with meals and atmost care is taken for security of students
With a firm belief that physical fitness leads to mental fitness, the college encourages various sports and games.

Sports facilities are provided to the students for both indoor and outdoor games. Various inter college sports tournaments are conducted by the college sports council. The students also take part in various inter collegiate and varsity sports meet.

The Sports Council consisting of senior staff members and the captains of the College teams organise an Annual Sports and Athletics meet as part of "VIDYUTH" which is an Inter Engineering Colege festival and encourages the students to participate in various VTU Inter collegiate sports activities.
Good number of city buses ply from City Central Bus Stand. From City – Route Nos. 112, 119, 123, 83, 84, 10, 101, 122, 116 (Volvo).

[A] Fee Concession/Scholarships from Director of Technical Education, Bangalore.
[1] Fee concession to the students belonging to group 2A, 2B, 3A & 3B students whose parents/guardian income is not more than Rs.11,000/- P.A.
[2] Fee concession to the SC/ST and category-1 group students whose income is not more than Rs. 1,00,000/- P.A.
[3] Government of India National Merit Scholarship.

[B] Scholarship from District Social Welfare Office, Mysore District, Mysore.
[1] Government of India post metric scholarship of scheduled caste and scheduled tribe students.

[C] Scholarship from District Officer for Backward Classes & Minorities, Mysore District, Mysore.
[1] Post metric scholarship to students belonging to back word classes and minorities.

[E] S.J. Jindal Trust, Jindal – Nigam Tumkur Road, Bangalore
[1] Award of Scholarship.
Well equipped gym located in boys hostel. Trainer to help in fitness of the students

Apple Labs furnished with 25 Apple computers for ios development workshops so as to make students ready in coding for current trends
Interactive class with Projectors, Well arranged seating, ventilation and Class Recording in every classrooms
1. Promote best practices in teaching-learning, with dedicated staff and supportive infrastructure to create technically competent engineers.
2. Inculcate ethical and cultural values, communication and Entrepreneurial skills
3. Provide exposure of tools and technologies necessary to pursue higher education and research.
4. Improve Industry-Institute relationship for mutual benefit

The Department of Computer Science & Engineering was established in the year 1997, right from the inception of the Institution. The objective of the Department is imparting quality technical education. The department is well equipped with good infrastructure such as latest computers, Laboratory Equipments, 10 Mbps leased line connection & Wi-Fi Internet connectivity and well qualified faculty members.
The Department of Computer Science and Engineering shall create professionally competent and socially responsible engineers capable of working in global environment.
Dr. A B RAJENDRA\n( Professor & HoD )
Well equipped labs with 32bit i3, i5 with 4 to 8gb RAM systems connected to LAN networks.
Air Conditioned Seminar Hall for seminars from guest lecturers, workshops, etc.
1. Provide the best teaching-learning environment through proficient staff and excellent infrastructure.
2. Inculcate professional values and entrepreneurial skills to fulfill the career and societal needs.
4. Facilitate interaction with elite Institutions and Industries for knowledge sharing.

Information Science is a field that has shrunk the world, brought distant places closer, made man get in touch with data and people, with the speed and power of lightning. The advancements in this sphere have been unbelievably tremendous. In the modern tech-savvy world, information science as a branch of engineering has been luring students because of its vast scope and opportunities. The focus of this branch is the design and implementation of information systems. The Department of Information Science & Engineering was established in the year 1999.The program prepares the students to design and manage computerized data processing and decision support .The program is technically oriented, emphasizing the design and implementation aspects of large scale information systems as well as the more traditional, managerial and organizational issues. It also balances development of systems engineering skills with learning to deliver reliable systems on time and within a specified budget.
To be a premier department for quality education in Information Science and Engineering creating competent professionals to meet the societal needs.
1. Impart technical competency in Electrical and Electronics Engineering through competent staff, effective teaching learning process and good infrastructure.
2. Strengthen industry institute interaction for knowledge sharing and innovative projects.
3. Inculcate professional ethics, self-learning capability, entrepreneurial skills and leadership qualities for overall professional success.
4. Foster research and development activities for academic excellence.

The Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering was started in 2004. The Department caters the need of the students by providing quality education. The Department has well qualified & dedicated faculty members; 14 teaching, 1 Foreman, 2 Assistant Instructors and one office clerk. Highly qualified experienced and dedicated staff members are the backbone of the department.This course is designed to meet the needs of Electrical Power Generation, Power Transmission and Distribution, Electrical Power Utilization, Modern Control Theory, Electrical CAD, High Voltage Engineering, Circuits, Machines, Drives etc.
The Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering shall create competent professionals through quality education and research for benefit of the society.
Well equipped lab with modern instruments, well equipped machine labs and design labs.
1. Promote innovative teaching-learning methods to enhance problem solving skills
2. Enhance industry-institute interaction for mutual benefit by collaborating with Industries.
3. Facilitate research and developmental activities by providing state - of–the- art facilities in the research centers.
4. Nurture entrepreneurial skills by establishing incubation center
5. Promote Leadership qualities, work culture and professional ethics through overall personality development.

The Department of Mechanical Engineering was established in 1997 with an intake of 120. The department has grown leaps and bounds since then. Mechanical Department has its own block housing all the laboratories, workshops, and lecture halls and staff rooms. It has a student population of 360 with an annual intake of 90 (since 2009). The department is well equipped with state- of- the- art laboratories, workshops & infrastructural facilities. The machine shop has a CNC lathe besides conventional lathes, milling machines, drilling machines, etc. The department has excellent computational facilities and resources both in terms of hardware and software. The department has 110 computers loaded with a wide range of software Packages.
To be a Centre of Excellence in Mechanical Engineering promoting value added education, distinguishing research and innovative entrepreneurship.
Well equipped workshops with classic machines like lathe to modern CNC lathe machines to impart practical knowledge with classical machines to modern machines
Well equipped Design labs with 110 systems loaded with wide range of software packages
1. To impart quality education through competent staff and excellent infrastructure.
2. To provide conducive environment for holistic personality development.
3. To encourage research in frontier areas for meeting the societal needs.
4. To nurture the spirit of entrepreneurial skills among students

The Electronics & Communication Engineering program was started in the year 1997. The focus of the Department is to produce graduates with strong fundamentals in electronics and communication domain. The course is structured on outcome based education praradigm to help students to achieve the goals. The Department is the most sought after branch of engineering by top CET (conducted by Karnataka examination authority) rank holders. The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering with highly qualified staff is well equipped with centralized laboratories having the latest configurations and software tools.
The department of Electronics and Communication Engineering shall excel in academics through quality education and research, producing value embedded professionals to serve the society.
Well equipped lab with modern instruments and Robotics lab for encouraging development is robotics.
Frequent Industrial visits to enrich students with real life industrial knowledge and knowledge of industrial equipments
1. Provide quality education emphasizing on emerging technologies through competent staff and modern facilities
2. Imbibe logical thinking ability, communication skills, professional ethics, leadership and entrepreneurial qualities
3. Promote research for developing sustainable infrastructure
”> 4. Take up collaborative projects for long term association with industry and academic experts

The Department of Civil Engineering was started in the year 2013 with an intake of 60 students. The State-of-art Laboratories are set up to cater the needs of students. The course is aimed at training students for suitable skilled engineering personnel required for industries and governmental organizations. To gain valuable contact with industry and to have practical exposure, routine lectures are supplemented with distinguished lectures, field trips offering valuable networking opportunities with future employers.
The Department of Civil Engineering shall develop socially responsible civil engineers through quality education keeping pace with emerging technologies.
Well equipped labs and survey instruments for best in class practical knowledge imparting
To develop value-centered leaders by fostering a conducive environment to disseminate business knowledge and practices that is entrepreneurial in spirit, ethical in focus, and global in orientation

The Department of Business Administration started in the year 2008 to give quality education and to enable the student community to take up responsibility of building managerial skills with a view to moulding them for managerial positions in the industry. Since its inception ,the department stands one among the best management schools in Mysuru, providing excellent academic delivery and infrastructure to students.The department offers full time two years MBA programmes with dual specialization in streams of Finance,Marketing and Human Resources.
To be recognized as a center of excellence in management education by creating and realizing Life-changing opportunities for graduates.
Training & Placement Officer\nRoopa Priya J K

The Training and Placement department (TAP) is an integral part of VVCE connecting students of BE, MTech and MBA, and also the faculty members of all the departments. The department works in close co-ordination with Department Placement Coordinators (DPC), comprising of both students and faculty members chosen from individual departments.

TAP dept strives to connect industry and institute through various programs such as student internships, industrial training, industry visit, technical talk by industry delegates and many more. The dept is in close association with various reputed companies and continues to coordinate with esteemed recruiters to enhance placements at VVCE.

The center is in touch with many hardware, software companies, mechanical and information technology industries for placement of potential candidates. We work on a industry-feedback methodology, where the industry gives us feedback on the performance of our earlier students, and which in turn, is used to modify the existing teaching practices.
